Articles.Content:
Is there such a mod that supplies structural panels that are 1 meter by 0.5 meters? A structural panel that is 0.5 meters by 0.5 meters would also be really useful.

Thanks in advance.

Improved Trusses and Girders comes with 0.5 x 0.5 m panels - you might need to manually fix it for 0.22 by encapsulating the CFG file definitions with PART{ and }, though.

As for 1.0 x 0.5 m panels, you could study how combining multiple models using 0.20's MODEL{} node system works - johnsonwax wrote a nice tutorial regarding this.
Can you tell me how to fix the Improved Trusses and Girders mod? I don;t know how to do the above.

Can you tell me how to fix the Improved Trusses and Girders mod? I don;t know how to do the above.

As I already said, go into each of the part's CFG files with a text editor like Notepad++ and prepend PART{ / append } to their contents.
